title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight Pushback Helper
description:
In this addon spotlight we will have a look at the "pushback helper" mod for MSFS 2020. Using this mod you will be able to navigate easier during pushback and in addition connect the jetway by simply pressing a button. In addition to this refueling is also easier, just push the button and wait for the fuel truck to arrive. 

The mod can be downloaded from the site below:
https://flightsim.to/file/853/pushback-helper-v2-0
